entry.title: Binance Labs Invests $10M to Accelerate Helio Protocol's Liquid Staking Pivot
entry.summary: LSDfi is a fast growing space within DeFi. Now Binance is throwing capital into it.

entry.title: Post Malone Disses CBDCs on Joe Rogan Podcast—And Bitcoiners Love It
entry.summary: Bitcoin supporters back the celebs’ take on CBDCs as the “digital dollar” discussion reaches mainstream audiences.

entry.title: As Coach Swallows Versace, A Crypto Divide Grows in Luxury Fashion
entry.summary: An $8.5 billion merger between luxury giants could have major implications for the future of blockchain in fashion.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Investments Surged in July as Metaverse NFTs Fizzled Out
entry.summary: Investors pumped $297 million into the fledging crypto video game industry in July, but metaverse NFT sales have slowed significantly.

entry.title: The Godfather of Generative Art Goes Global
entry.summary: Pioneering generative artist Casey Reas will release "923 Empty Rooms" with Bright Moments and Art Blocks at live events spanning six cities.

entry.title: Alameda Hits a Snag in Lawsuit Over $9 Billion Locked in Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
entry.summary: The FTX affiliate first sued Grayscale in March. Now it says it needs more time to find a co-plaintiff.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Bittrex Agrees to Pay $24 Million to Settle SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Four months after the SEC sued, bankrupt exchange Bittrex has agreed to a settlement without admitting to or denying the allegations.

entry.title: AI Is Literally Trying to Kill You With This Grocery Store App
entry.summary: Trying to use up leftovers? An AI-powered app produced ghastly results when users input things like "turpentine" and "ant-poison."

entry.title: Roblox Is Tapping AI to Generate 'More Rich and Dynamic' Games: CEO
entry.summary: One of the biggest games on the planet wants to let creators design games by typing prompts. Here’s how Roblox is approaching AI.

entry.title: Digital Currency Group Wants 'Hodgepodge' Gemini Lawsuit Tossed Out
entry.summary: A letter supporting the motion accused Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss of a “Twitter-based character assassination campaign.”

entry.title: Gemini Opens XRP Deposits and Trading Following Ripple Labs Partial Victory
entry.summary: Users will soon be able to trade the cryptocurrency on the platform.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Trade Sideways as Inflation Jumps to 3.2% in July
entry.summary: Inflation has trended downward since it hit 9.1% last June, but the Fed’s target of 2% is the ultimate goal.

entry.title: Jump Crypto Leads $5 Million Seed Round in Bitcoin Wallet Xverse
entry.summary: The Xverse wallet supports projects like Ordinals, Stacks, and the blockchain’s speedy Lightning Network.

entry.title: Maker Founder Proposes ‘Pre-Farming Airdrop’ for Spark Lending Platform
entry.summary: The airdrop proposal is aimed at increasing borrowing activity through Spark, and allowing early users to “secure early SPK tokens.”

entry.title: Crypto Derivatives Are Industry's Next Key Source of Growth, Says Genesis Trading
entry.summary: With the spot market drying up, Genesis Trading points to rising derivatives volumes as the industry's next growth engine.

entry.title: Aptos Futures Demand Hits 3-Month High as Traders Rush to Short APT
entry.summary: Traders are lining up to bet against the APT token amid a hyped new AI partnership with Microsoft and a massive token unlock this weekend.

entry.title: Circle CEO Urges Industry to Keep Dollar Stablecoins 'On Shore'
entry.summary: Resharing a recent video on crypto's role in the future of finance, Circle CEO has urged the industry to keep stablecoin development "on shore."

entry.title: Bolero 'Song Shares' Paints Bright Future for Future of NFT-fueled Music
entry.summary: Bolero Music's blockchain-based model lets fans to invest in music, and gives them a fraction of a song’s master recording.

entry.title: Google Hungers for More Data to Train Its AI—But At What Cost?
entry.summary: Google stands ready to use your online content to train its AI models, unless it's told to stop.

entry.title: Did Special Counsel Jack Smith Get Donald Trump's Twitter DMs?
entry.summary: Twitter loses its appeal of a contempt ruling and $350,000 fine over Donald Trump's account.

entry.title: DeGods Ditch Polygon, Moving y00ts to Ethereum and Returning $3 Million Grant
entry.summary: From Solana to Polygon—and ultimately Ethereum, as DeLabs reveals plans to bring y00ts to the same chain as DeGods.

entry.title: Frens Forever? Building a Social Graph on Bitcoin With Ordinals
entry.summary: The creator calls it "a way to use Ordinals to come closer to the Web3 ethos of a decentralized social network on Bitcoin."

entry.title: SEC Says It Plans to Appeal XRP Sales Ruling in Ripple Case
entry.summary: The SEC is seeking an "interlocutory appeal" of Judge Torres' ruling, the regulatory said in a court filing today.

entry.title: Supreme Court Says Apple App Store Rules Can Stand—For Now
entry.summary: Epic Games will have to wait even longer for its opportunity to prove that Apple’s policies constitute unfair competition.

entry.title: Major US Cities Dominate AI Job Market, Leaving Others Behind: Report
entry.summary: While some cities are thriving on AI, the Brookings Institution warns that other locations are at risk of becoming tech deserts.

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.

entry.title: Meet the Company Building AI Fighter Jets for the U.S. Military
entry.summary: Kratos Defense aims to redefine air combat and usher in a new era of AI-enhanced flight.

entry.title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin: Crypto Community Never Really Respected Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: He also said that the impact on AI on jobs is both terrible and amazing.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: How Decentraland Is Using AI to Make the Metaverse Feel More Alive
entry.summary: Ethereum-powered metaverse game Decentraland is embracing AI, letting you chat with a brainy 'bot or a buff Doge bodybuilder.

entry.title: Top Democrat Maxine Waters 'Deeply Concerned' Over Launch of PayPal Stablecoin
entry.summary: The Congresswoman said federal regulators must have a role in overseeing the industry.

entry.title: Amazon Is Giving Away Free Gaming NFTs—Here's How to Claim
entry.summary: Amazon Prime subscribers can grab free in-game NFTs for games like Mojo Melee and Blankos Block Party. Here’s what you can get right now.

entry.title: Coinbase Ethereum L2 Launches Mainnet With $142M Already on Its Network
entry.summary: The company says it has no plans to launch a native token on Base, and will prioritize supporting network-native developers.

entry.title: Microsoft AI Integration Sends Aptos Token APT Soaring 13%
entry.summary: Aptos Labs and Microsoft just signed a multiyear partnership to help drive Web3 adoption.

entry.title: Galaxy Digital Stems Q2 Losses Thanks to Resurging Bitcoin Prices
entry.summary: Galaxy Digital reported a substantial reduction in net loss last quarter, narrowing by over $500 million year-to-year to reach $46 million.

entry.title: Maple Finance Opens Treasury Bill Pool to Accredited US Investors
entry.summary: Powered by T-Bills, Maple Finance is finally opening the doors to its "risk-free" cash management pool for accredited U.S. investors.

entry.title: Cube3.AI Secures $8.2M to Launch AI-Powered Blockchain Security App
entry.summary: CUBE3’s Protect software enables smart contract deployers to deal with cyber attacks and vulnerabilities without pausing their protocols.

entry.title: The Fed’s Stablecoin Note Takes Aim at Bank Runs, Reversible Transactions
entry.summary: The central bank is also ramping up its program to supervise all crypto activities among the network of banks it oversees.

entry.title: Bitstamp to End Trading of Solana, Polygon and 5 Other Altcoins for US Users
entry.summary: All seven tokens to be "permanently" suspended for trading on Bitstamp were earlier classified by the SEC as unregistered securities.

entry.title: SHIB, PEPE Lead Market Gains as US Fed Launches Crypto Supervision Program
entry.summary: After SHIB and PEPE, the wider crypto market enjoyed a hefty boost after the Fed issued new clarifications about reigning in the industry.

entry.title: Musician Grimes Is 'Pathologically Optimistic' About AI
entry.summary: In an interview with Wired, the artist says she made more money from the NFTs than from music.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza
entry.summary: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.

entry.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup
entry.summary: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.

entry.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges
entry.summary: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.

entry.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee
entry.summary: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.

entry.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO
entry.summary: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor
entry.summary: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect
entry.summary: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies
entry.summary: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
entry.summary: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
